question.title: Getting error message. Project 'CINE_DB' has a higher compiler options than running Eclipse
question.body:
When I tried to open Hibernate in the configurations perspective, I got this message:

Project CINE_DB has higher compiler options than running Eclipse. Hibernate plugins unable to load its classes. Please decrease the compiler option or run the Eclipse with higher JDK level.

Error Message

I'm using STS:

  • Spring Tool Suite 4
  • Version: 4.29.1.RELEASE
  • Build Id: 202503181406
  • Revision: 806640e3af881dd5d3e9fc6e108e051fa1e1f7c2

SpringToolSuite4.init:

-vm
plugins/org.eclipse.justj.openjdk.hotspot.jre.full.win32.x86_64_21.0.6.v20250130-0529/jre/bin
D:\software\JAVA\jdk-17.0.12\bin\javaw.exe

Java version:

  • java 17.0.12 2024-07-16 LTS
  • Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 17.0.12+8-LTS-286)
  • Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 17.0.12+8-LTS-286, mixed mode, sharing)

Project Java build path: java build path

Java compiler: Java compiler

pom.xml

<plugin>
    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>3.11.0</version>
    <configuration>
        <source>17.0.12</source>
        <target>17.0.12</target>
    </configuration>
</plugin>

Does anyone know how to fix this?

I've modified the SpringToolSuite4.init file and verified the Java version is properly installed.

I want to open Hibernate configuration.
